input.sentences: it was early | but many soccer fans were quickly packing the stadium to watch the championship game .
young and old alike were ready for the big game to kick off .
the crowd began to cheer as the visiting team made their way on to the pitch .
a big roar came when the home team made their way out .
everyone was glued as the opening ceremonies began knowing the opening kick was only minutes away .
output.sentences: We love going to the stadium for soccer games.
This particular day was quite chilly.
There were some exciting plays on the field.
Our team did well in the tournament and played two different team.
At the end of the tournament our team won several metals.
